titles: The cities great concern in this case of question of honour and arms whether apprentiship extinguisheth gentry discoursed : with a clear refutation of the pernicious error that it doth.
author: Bolton, Edmund, 1575?-1633?
Philipot, John, 1589?-1645.
notes: Written by Edmund Bolton; has been wrongly attributed to John Philipot. Cf. DNB.
First published in 1629 under title: The cities advocate.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
